description: Implemented output_format="code" for get_symbols - returns raw source code without JSON/TOON wrapper. Smart default: uses "code" when code bodies are available (mode=minimal/full), otherwise falls back to "auto" (TOON/JSON). This is optimal for AI agents that can read code directly. 12 get_symbols tests passing. Based on contributor suggestion from PR #4 about returning code instead of structured metadata for code extraction use cases.
